overview: Setting sail on all-new adventures: ‘Pirates and Princesses’ is the first DVD from Funbox – the brand new show from Anya, Gary, Kevin and Bonzo the Dog.  Will the gang find all the keys that open the amazing FUNBOX – which contains everything they need to sing songs and have fun, and still be home in time for tea? With the help of Kevin’s pirate galleon, Anya’s beautiful fairytale castle and Gary’s endless supply of musical instruments they just might. Overflowing with songs old and new, its a treat for kids of all ages – from nought to ninety.
title: FUNBOX: Pirates and Princesses
